p: The tests performed to evaluate the antioxidant activity (% AA) were carried out at the Laboratory of Pharmacognosy and Phytochemistry of the Federal University of Amapá—UNIFAP. According to the methodology of Sousa et al. [ 25], Lopes-Lutz et al. [ 51] and Andrade et al. [ 52], with adaptations; on the consumption of DPPH.
